column2: Actuations are handled through creating Command objects from instance graphs
Data schema logic is handled when creating Command and Telemetry objects
Sensor interfaces are handled through creating Telemetry objects from instance graphs
Measurement units and quantity kinds are handled through mapping to DTDL semantic types when creating Telemetry objects
Data schemas will be handled through Telemetry and Command generation
QUDT-based datatypes are used to generate DTDL Semantic Types
column3: they are not themselves translated to interfaces

column2: REC analytics are out-of-scope for DTDL models

The REC observation and device event models are out-of-scope for DTDL models

REC placement contexts should probably be expressed as properties in DTDL
The REC Information class is intangible and probably not fit for instantiation as DT
